summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6114 for the improvement of 21st Avenue Northeast from East 68th Street to East 75th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84481, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
